Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Malibu in 1972...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/18/1983 to a 5-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Halifax on 10/22/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1985, hitting .481 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Had 34-game hitting streak snapped on 6/14/1985...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1985, hitting .545 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against Troy on 9/11/1986...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Troy on 9/11/1986...
Traded from Gashouse to Pontiac on 3/1/1987 (Going to PON: SS D. Tremane. Going to GHG: P T. Worthy, P H. Outland)...
Signed as a free agent by Longport on 2/20/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $7,500,000 per year...
Had 24-game hitting streak snapped on 5/9/1989...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1989, hitting .519 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1989, hitting .520 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1989, hitting .560 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1989, hitting .684 with 0 HR, 5 RBI...
